original_text:
The Lord is angry with all nations;
    his wrath is on all their armies.
He will totally destroy them,
    he will give them over to slaughter.
korean_text: 대저 여호와께서 열방을 향하여 진노하시며 그들의 만군을 향하여 분내사 그들을 진멸하시며 살륙 당하게 하셨은즉

sentences.original_text: The Lord is angry with all nations
his wrath is on all their armies
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 진노가 그들의 모든 군대 위에 있도다

sentences.original_text: he will give them over to slaughter
